results.title: Hoox - Generate perfect videos in seconds with AI
results.text:
#1 Best AI video for social media Turn a simple idea into a complete video, without any skill No skills needed One click edit Made for social media M Maria Communication Manager "Hoox allows me to post 2 videos a day effortlessly, and the results on my brand have been immediate." A new Nuxe anti-aging product video 30 seconds You only need 3 clicks Write down your idea, select your parameters, take a coffee. 1 Start by We all have ideas for videos we'd like to create, now you can make that idea a reality.
Write down the video you want, and the AI will write an optimized script for you. 2 Select your Choose the voice that best embodies your project, your brand, your video...
We have many high-quality, multilingual language choices 3 Let our AI Stop spending hours looking for the best footage.
Our AI takes care of you by finding the right media between stock footage, your own videos and very soon, AI generated videos. Create videos that humans love to watch AI-powered videos that engage, built on viral success patterns. Create video content more easily, faster and effortlessly Create dozens of videos in no time, our AI agent handles everything from script to final edit. Keep control You don't like something ? You can change everything in 1 click.
